title: Unspecified Error when selecting Masteries
body:
When selecting a mastery page in champ select i get unspecified error and it goes back to an empty mastery page.
This caused me great disadvantage in 2 rankeds as restarting has not fixed this!

replies.body: Same here..especially after I change  Masteries. If I change mastery pages..it ALWAYS seems to happen.

This issue typically happens if one of more of your mastery pages is corrupt. Hop into your summoner profile and go to your *Masteries*. Delete the mastery page that it firsts shows you, then hop into a custom match to confirm this has resolved the issue. If it didn't, you'll need to delete all of your mastery pages and create them all from scratch.

Let me know if this helped.
